sentences.english: Both the number of reproductive vegetative tillers and tillers were dominant at the maturity stage, but at the flowering stage.
sentences.chinese: 其營養櫱數與生殖櫱數在籽實成熟期高於開花期。

sentences.english: Generally, the type of A. nuda with shorter awn have a stronger productivity of seed.
sentences.chinese: 芒越短，產種性能越高，籽實也更飽滿。

sentences.english: The farmer takes care not to damage a single bean.
sentences.chinese: 這位農夫動作小心，唯恐傷及任何一枚籽實。

sentences.english: The birds have eaten up all the seeds collected with great effort.
sentences.chinese: 他們好不容易收集到的籽實都被小鳥吃了。
